creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta G. Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Three four-selvage panels; square cut neckline; discontinuous supplementary weft patterning; center panel red ground with green, blue and purple vertical zigazags; two side panels white ground with red patterning divided by green, blue, and purple vertical zigazags.
medium: Cotton, rayon; discontinuous supplementary weft patterning
title: Woman's ceremonial blouse (Huipil)
